data.description:
Become a Star Shaman in this funky space shooter with a unique playstyle, lush graphics and the funkiest soundtrack in VR!

Features:
- 9 powerful weapons to unlock
- A unique spell casting system made for VR
- 3 solar systems to revive
- 50+ unlockable feats
- 11 achievements
- Built-in visual timer for speedruns captures

The Universe is counting on you, Shaman!

changelog.change_log:
Greetings Shamans, 
We are delighted to share our first major update that we have been working on based on your feedback:

- Better player progression: you now unlock spells and items within your runs, and unlock permanent weapons and abilities in-between runs. Save three planets and youâ€™ll be wielding the astral sword for the rest of your runs!
- 3 new spells: Beam (hold trigger to channel it towards enemies) Nova (fry hand-thrown grenade) and Jolt Daemon (a jolt-firing entity to fight alongside you for a limited time).
- Updated graphics with 15 new moons, in-game UI in a higher resolution.
- Revised and shortened tutorial.
- 90Hz mode on Quest 2.
- Quicker loading times.
- Italian, Spanish, Chinese and Japanese subtitled added

Stay safe, and see you on the Milky Way.

Greetings, Star Shaman!
We have made significant progress with the Astral Teleporter and have addressed the drops in performance on the Oculus Quest 1. The entire experience runs more smoothly and evenly across the board.
The Kybele have been shoring up their reliquary and it should now be easier to understand what Shamans can trade there. We held numerous talks over the last days and we have now convinced them to dismiss their annoying habit of sticking item cards into your hands after leaving the reliquary.
We also have added general quality of life improvements.
The Astral Teleporter technology is key to our success and we are working round the clock to provide you and your fellow Shamans with future updates. Stay tuned because we will be in contact again soon.
Bend a beam!
